description: When a prostitute and a junkie are viciously murdered, homicide detectives Ross (Stallone) and Lynch (Babushkina) are sent in to investigate. But as the death tole and pressure rises they are confronted with the possibility that the killer may be a rogue cop.

title: Antidote
description: In a post-apocalyptic plague-ridden world, a man and woman face unimaginable horrors when he suddenly becomes infected, and the only possible cure slowly drives him mad.

title: Son of Ghostman
description: "Son of Ghostman" was a 2013 movie which spoofs television horror movie hosts.

title: Blind Justice
description: BLIND JUSTICE is the ruthless story of Paulina, a mother facing a relentless struggle to demonstrate to justice that her children has been sexually abused by their father. An story of difficulties faced by the incapacity of the law and tearing situations happening to defenseless children victims of domestic violence. Based on true events.

title: Detrás del Poder
description: What would you do if one day you open the door of your house, a man you've never seen before hits you, ties you to a chair, pulls out a bottle of tequila and you start counting down your life? In addition, little by little, you're going to realize that this seemingly strange man knows everything about you and your main intention is to give you a shot in the head.

title: The Warp
description: An ambitious ghost hunter is hired by a wealthy building owner to investigate a haunted factory, and she contracts a crew of inexperienced workers to research. The crew becomes possessed by the paranormal presence in the building and the ghost hunters have to escape the factory.

title: The Aztec Box
description: 4 college students dig up an ancient Aztec relic in their own backyard, only to discover a dark force that is attached to it.

title: Loss of Life
description: On October 31, 2012, in North Hollywood, California, a group of high school friends decided to document their Halloween night out. Upon stumbling a horrific bloody attack, it soon quickly turned into the worst night of their lives.

title: The Beautiful Spy
description: In 1938 Paris, Vera von Schalburg, a young German with Russian, Danish, and Polish roots, is a very special woman. She speaks several languages fluently, has a photographic memory, intelligence, and presence of mind, and is callous. Except for her little son Christian, she has no one in the world. In order to keep Christian and herself afloat, she works as a prostitute in an elegant brothel. But then she gets an unusual offer.

title: Jalebi
description: A struggling theater artist must avail the ultimate opportunity and find a way to fulfill his ever lasting dream to become a star, But he does not know where fate takes him with every step he takes.

title: Dominium
description: Horrific paranormal hauntings disturb a documentary crew's boundary-pushing film. Investigating an unsettling ceremony, they uncover mysteries that'll put all of their lives in danger.

title: Dead Sign
description: When art student Kangsheng returns to his remote hometown village with his classmates to search of ancient murals, they are witness to a fatal car accident. Kangsheng's girlfriend Wangzhi unintentionally interrupts the local witchcraft ritual for the deceased. Horrified, the group flee the scene and settle at the inn owned by Kangsheng's mother. The following day, out searching for murals, the group find instead a mysterious hand-painted sign in a cave. The surprises are only beginning.
originalTitle: Gu zhen xiong ling zhi wu zhou chan shen

title: By Demons Be Driven
description: An enforcer for a crime syndicate reemerges into the underworld after an unexplained absence. His former bosses are forced to entrust him with a mysterious new job of the utmost importance that could bring their world crashing down around them if it is not completed.

title: Rekorder
description: Rekorder is the story of Maven, a tragic drifter who with his old camcorder records movies currently showing in theaters to sell the footage to pirates. The parting image shows Ronnie in the movie theater without his camcorder in hand. For the first time, he isn't asleep while the movie is playing. He is just there, sitting alone and motionless, completely engrossed by the movie he is watching. As it turns out, the movie is not the commercial features he has been recording throughout the years for the enterprising pirates, but security camera footage of a robbery that culminates in violence.

title: Edge of Dawn
description: After surviving a car accident, two college students are caught up in a dangerous game of cat and mouse with a local resident. They must come together to survive the deadly night and unravel the mystery as to why this man is out to take their lives.

title: For No Eyes Only
description: When teenage computer geek Sam is unwillingly chained to his desk chair with a broken leg, he entertains himself by spying on his classmates through hacking their web cams - until he sees things that nobody is meant to see.

title: Post Mortem, America 2021
description: Lucille is murdered by crime boss Severin and his thugs, goes to hell and returns five years later as a demon/zombie to get her revenge.

title: Vuelven
description: A family that resides in the peaceful town of La Laguna (Cordoba) gets caught in a nightmare when they find themselves tormented and stalked by a mysterious masked assailant, who could be connected to a dark secret of the couple's past.

title: Chor Chor Super Chor
description: In the crowded by lanes of old Delhi, Shukla ji runs a small photo studio as a front for small time crime. Over the years he has groomed a bunch of youngsters in the art of pick pocketing and petty crime. Then one day a girl comes into their midst and then everything collapses.

title: The Poisoning
description: Three men travel across the country and encounter a hitchhiker that turns their world upside down. A maddening hell ride and a race for surivival ensue!

title: In a Goodly Way
description: A 'Murder Ballad' inspired tale of Simon Carmichael's criminal activities and flight from the law. A pair of ruthless lawmen follow in pursuit as the desperate creature flees across the countryside, encountering a variety of filthy miscreants and sordid cretins.

title: Paku Pontianak
description: After Adam hits a girl on the road while driving, he and his family decide to repent for their mistake by letting her live with them. The girl, whose name is Melati has amnesia and therefore, cannot remember her past. But her arrival also leads to mysterious happenings, and it seems that Melati's past may turn out to be haunting her.

title: Beholder
description: A female psychic joins forces with a skeptical cop to stop a serial killer, only to become the bait when they discover the killer is hunting psychics.

title: Doomsday Party
description: 5 strangers' lives will intertwine together at a bank heist. Each of their stories will twist and turn to unexpected climax. The robbery will change their lives forever, but will they get a fresh start or to a point of no return?

title: I Am Vengeance
description: A schizophrenic teenage girl attempts to uncover her mysterious path and the murder of her family.

title: Cold Storage
description: Two men embark on a dramatic expedition to the North Pole, widely considered the toughest on Earth. They journey 400 plus miles on foot facing harsh temperatures to below 50 degrees F. Into the Cold is a bone-chilling story of true bravery, incredible courage and unrelenting determination.

title: Ek Bura Aadmi
description: Inspired by real life stories of some well-known criminal-turned-politicians from eastern Uttar Pradesh and Bihar, the film Ek Bura Aadmi is a realistic portrayal of the power politics of the Hindi belt wherein money and muscle power play very prominent roles. It narrates the story of Munna Siddiqi who starts as a disciple of a politician practising value-based politics but ends up being a consummate practitioner of manipulative politics. Through the story of Munna, whose intentions are noble to help the poor and downtrodden masses fight for the basic amenities but who employs questionable means to achieve these goals, the film Ek Bura Aadmi raises some serious questions about the working of the modern Indian society and the prevailing political culture.

title: Escape from Babylon
description: An ex-cop turned taxi driver continues to watch over the city he once protected.

title: The Haunted Swing
description: A town haunted by the Hill children - victims of a tragic house fire which claimed their lives a quarter of a century ago. Years later, the children still haunt their swing, located on the plot of land where their house once stood.

title: Til Min Mor
description: A deaf girl loses her mother and decides to try and find her on her own.

title: Clean Break
description: A psycho girlfriend, Tracy, moves in with her boyfriend Scott and his two roommates, Cam and Dan, only to start targeting them when they get in the way of her plans for the perfect relationship.

title: Slaughterhouse 2: Prelude
description: On Christmas Eve, a group of friends promote a particular party; among them a familiar face that will later unfold amid an outbreak of insanity, torture and death. The creator of the original toasts the audience with this raw prequel, with the intent to disturb the public in every way, in a spectacle of violence and mayhem.

title: Mein Mann, ein Mörder
description: Minette knows that her husband Paul is cheating on her. She also knows that he is with Nora in Prague, although he pretends that he was on a "business trip" to Frankfurt. When challenged, Paul swears to end the affair.

title: Spiritual Contact: The Movie
description: Since the age of 11, Jeremiah has had an unknown gift. An 11th birthday present that he was unaware of, Jeremiah could see through to a parallel world which too many only exists in book and stories. The ability to see the paranormal world is what sets Jeremiah apart from those around him. So he begins his journey continually seeking spiritual help as a weapon to fight the battle against evil.

title: Das Jerusalem-Syndrom
description: A young pregnant woman who lives in Jerusalem believes she is going to bring the son of God into the world. Her older sister tries to convince her to return with her to Germany. Then the young woman disappears.

title: Fallen Angels
description: Desperately trying to live normal lives after a practical joke escalates to murder, four young men one by one begin to crack under the pressure of the secrets they share.

title: Der zweite Mann
description: A young financial auditor, promoted to his first serious position, soon finds himself following in the fatal footsteps of his predecessor.

title: Kill Her, Not Me
description: A group of sorority sisters spend their leadership weekend fighting for their lives in a remote mountain cabin.

title: Lauren Is Missing
description: Two women, a missing roommate, some taxidermy, a creepy blind man and a lot of booze.

title: Shadow of a Stranger
description: A young woman, June, meets a mysterious, albeit nice, stranger one day. Being cordial, she briefly lets him into her life. But very gradually, she begins to realize this stranger is anything but nice. Quickly, her life becomes endangered, and a deadly game of cat and mouse begins...

title: Encounter
description: As this story unfolds, crime, politics, and the law are represented as intertwined.

title: La hermandad
description: Sara is a popular novelist who after suffering an accident, is hosted in a remote monastery in which inhabits an ancient brotherhood of Benedictine monks. While Sara is recovering in bed, she begins to feel curious about strange happenings.

title: Sølvtråd
description: Helle is chased by herself in her dreams, but when she seeks out a psychic her life is about to change

title: Olvídame
description: Víctor is the leader of a sect and murders his occasional partners. Ámbar is a stripper with an exultant and disturbing sexuality. She uses sex as a vehicle for her own destruction. They fall viscerally and passionately in love.

title: Last Floor
description: Psychological portrait of a dismissed army captain gradually plunging deeper and deeper into his nationalist paranoia.

title: Only in L.A.
description: Set in and around Los Angeles, we follow a series of vignettes that capture a unique moment of love, hate, clarity, confusion, triumph, and failure among our characters' relationships with one another and with the city itself.

title: Cape Town
description: Roland is a composer hired to write the score for a new movie called 'Cape Town'. Since he sold all his instruments, the producers of the film put him up at the local university so he can utilize the college's prestigious music facility to write the music by his end of the week deadline. Encountering composer's block, Roland finds that through his candid interpersonal communication with other creative artists such as himself, true inspiration aides him in his quest. Interwoven with the storyline of the composer are three subplots that show the stories that inspire Roland.

title: Phase Two
description: Set in a post-apocalyptic future as survivors of a deadly virus try to adapt. Reynolds, a high strung professor, and Sonya, his tough-minded assistant, fight to find a cure and take in a naive teen, Angela, who recently lost her father. Jim, a tough guy commando, and Eric, a scrawny movie quoting warrior, battle outlanders, gangs and infected while trying to salvage anything along the way. Frank, an honest G.I., and Derek, a ruthless soldier, are sent on a mission that tests their morals.

title: Maazii
description: Tarun and his wife Shrishti are living a happy life with there daughter . One day to save the Honor of a woman Tarun accidentally kills two gangsters. After this his black past unfolds and starts haunting his present life. Tarun has to go back to his roots and get out of his past to make his family secure and happy.

title: Echo Dr.
description: When their home security system malfunctions, a family struggles to survive an attack against a state of the art patrol guard that believes they are intruders.

title: Losers
description: In a small Swedish town in the early 1990s, a lonely teacher at the local job center, Åsa, finds herself attracted to an unemployed teenager. His youthful charm, adventurous attitude and ambitious personality reminds Åsa of her younger self. Attempting to get closer to him she arranges for a group of youths to try out one of his business ideas - a wildlife retreat in the mountains. But as the weekend progresses, nothing goes according to plan and the group is soon lost in the woods.

title: #Sequence
description: Jaime wants to go to Hollywood. His parents want him to go a bit farther.

title: All I Need
description: All I Need is an Independent Film based on the first self-published novel by Rebecca Carrigan (Becca Blue) Rebecca was the writer, director and producer of this film, and in 2014, All I Need won the Royal Reel Award at the Canadian International Film Festival. The movie was filled with a handful of brand new actors and indie musicians. The movie was shot between Cambridge Ontario and the lovely Vancouver British Columbia. The story follows a young girl and her guardian angel.

title: The Scapegoats
description: Tim Marshall is forced to return to Lunaport after 5 years away. He hope that he will be safe there now, but in the welcoming committee there are four people just dying to get rid of Mr. Marshall. Who will get to him first? Will he come out of this alive?

title: TimeLock
description: Tartan-Noir, crime thriller about a botched robbery, a safe that won't open and lives that have gone off the tracks.

title: Ghost Forest
description: On the northwest coast of the United States, a beautiful native guide splits the loyalties of two explores seeking the mythical sky burial platforms created after the Orphan Tsunami of 1700.

title: A Method
description: Follows Nina, a professional documentarian, and her crew as they chronicle the acting process of Andrea, a young and successful theatre performer, in her first major role in a feature film. Andrea's process becomes risky as she is encouraged to delve deeper into the dark reality of her character. Nina is there to record everything as the line between what is real and what is performance becomes dangerously blurred.

title: The Trials of Zander Peterson
description: Zander Peterson is a happily-married, passive, suburban scientist who is double-crossed by his boss and ultimately fired. Zander moves into a new office, but there is something in the basement... something that turns his life in a new direction. Evil takes residence in a new dwelling... his body.

title: Tourist Home
description: Ten rooms of a vacation home are checked in by different tourists. After staying there, the lives of the travelers change in unprecedented ways.

title: Four Square
description: When Keith, the 1-900 Psychic; Lonny, the Surfer Dude slash secret Investment Banker; Ahmad, the Pimp; and Hector, the Drug Dealer fail to make good on their debts with the infamous drug lord, Mister Bigg, they are paid a visit by mysterious drug supplier, Drake. To square off their financial troubles, Drake offers the four men to try Chamber, a new experimental drug that will make their greatest fantasies come true. If they survive the try out and get the word out on the streets all of their debts will be forgiven.

title: Meurtre en trois actes
description: With the ghost of Delphine, a sociétaire who committed suicide several months earlier, still hanging over the place, an unexplained series of backstage murders occurs at the Comédie-Française. Domont and his associate Strozzi investigate at this famous institution, where power plays and rivalries are the norm.

title: Shallow Creek Cult
description: While on a road trip to Shallow Creek, Louisiana to spread their grandfather's ashes in Shallow Creek Pond, two brothers are chased by a cannibalistic cult.

title: Tony
description: The story revolves around Tony who wants to make quick money and keep his girlfriend happy. His greed changes him eventually and complicates his relationship with his girlfriend.

title: Normalization
description: The film is a Slovak version of The Thin Blue Line, recounting the unsolved disappearance and murder of a young woman that happened thirty years ago. It was a case that was paraded in the communist media at the end of which seven individuals were found guilty of this heinous crime. They are the same individuals who at present proclaim their innocence.

title: Mister White
description: When a motley group of college freshmen choose bizarre Tyler Rooney as the new target for their juvenile pranks, Tyler calls upon hoodoo-cursed Mister White to exact a violent and bloody revenge.

title: Sekiseki renren
description: High school student Juri leaps to her death. Afterwards, Juri wanders to her house, school and street. She feels loneliness as nobody else is able to see her. She talks to those that she comes across including her mother and classmates, but nobody responds to her comments. Juri then sees a horrifying monster, which she never saw prior to her suicide. She calls the scary monster "Bug Man". When the mind of humans become weak, the Bug Man tempts those to commit suicide. One day, Juri walks along the street as usual. She then meets a girl that is able to see Juri. Juri names the girl Ringo-chan and plays at the park with her. Their happy moments does not last long. When they come back from the park, Juri sees Ringo-chan's mother with a grim face. The Bug Man is standing behind her mother.

title: Limbus
description: "Limbus" is a surreal thriller set in the afterlife. It's the story of four cult members after a mass suicide. Stuck in purgatory, they must search for the secrets beyond their existence. They travel through their pasts to unravel the future only to find out that only one can make it to the other side. It's a journey through the darkest memories that define a person and send them over the edge.

title: Psiko: Pencuri Hati (Thief of Heart)
description: How Far would you go in your research to write a novel about serial killers? Do you think lika a killer? This question consume the main character, Osidi. He was obsessed with his research to complete his last chapter in his novel entitled "The Victim". Osidi whose wretched soul seem to be in constant battle with himself tries to find some peace leaves to an island. However, the tension raised when another dead body found in the island... Is he a real killer?

title: Obra 67
description: After 20 years in prison, the famous burglar of houses Juan "el Candela" is released. Waiting for him are his son Juan "el Chispa" and his friend Cristo, with whom he will live while he gets used to living outside the prison. Following the example of his father, "El Chispa" and his partner Cristo will try to get money to promote his musical career.

title: L'homme de main
description: Fresh out of prison, Daniel joins a group of criminals in the Parisian suburbs. There he discovers a world where he is accepted as a friend and 'part of the family'. But has he made the right choice? And will he be finally able to face up to his own responsibilities?

title: Olipathivu
description: It is a story which will thrill you with the activities of the production team and their risk by following the assassin. It is also driven with high tech cyber-crime investigation techniques which will show case how the Police Department finds the lead. Conflict between assassin and the murder hire will raise gun fight and fighting skills between them. The unexpected twist and suspense at the end of the story is how we captivate the audience.

title: Miserable Marnie & The Shut In
description: Miserable Marnie Strauss (17), a lonely teenage girl, lives alone with her reclusive mother, Matilda in a small town. She dreams of nothing more than to befriend the popular girl, Spencer, but the feeling is not mutual. After a cruel prank breaks her spirit, Marnie embarks on a violent rampage, exacting revenge on all who have wronged her with the help of her new friend, Crystal.

title: Strive
description: Two young men and the struggle for survival in the rough environment in which they find themselves where drug deals and armed robbery were the order of the day. Things began to change as Ray decides to take another path and change his ways while Frank ventures into working for BJAY - the most notorious Kingpin. As Frank makes headway in actualizing his dream he is forced to adhere to Bjay's demands in satisfying Bjay's client's urge to have his childhood friend Jenny. Frank and Ray are found at crossroads and are torn between making the most important decision that may hurt them forever.

title: Bloody Date
description: Kurski, the criminal, involved in international gangland attracts Gosia, young, naive student in order to make her a part of his illegal and shocking plans. The girl starts her difficult, desperate fight for life.

title: The Uncle
description: Ignacio, 31, has an obsession with the figure of his uncle, Jaime Guzmán Errázuriz, collaborator of General Augusto Pinochet and principal creator of the 1980 Constitution and decides to interpret it in a play.

title: Deceit
description: Freshly out of jail, Xavier teams up with a mature conman to take part in an elaborate scam. When it appears he is being double-crossed, Xavier must take control of his destiny and rewrite history to prevent being sent back inside. The art of deception is never straightforward...

title: Bonzo
description: Mourning the loss of a family dog, a man moves into the woods to live off the land and... build a bomb.

title: Rasputin
description: Rasputin is a modern day story of the historical monk. Joe Durkin, who has an uncanny resemblance to the legendary Rasputin, gives a gripping performance that alternates between kindness, humor and ruthless domination. The suspenseful climax is powerful and unforgettable.

title: Music Store Massacre
description: Fed up with the evils of today's Society? So is Reverend Smith, but unlike you he has a remedy for it. See how he deals with murderers, rapists, white supremacists, child pornography, crooked lawyers, drug dealers, gang bangers, prejudice and the over all ills of our society. Take a ride through Reverend Smith's vengeful mind, where no one is safe and all are judged in "Music Store Massacre".

title: Jengo Hooper
description: A man named Jake Weaver stumbles across an old Jailakung board which he played around with not knowing it would open up the gates of hell. A demonic force latches onto him and takes over his mind.

title: Sociopath
description: SOCIOPATH is a psychological thriller about a 30yr old under achiever who still lives at home with his hateful parents. His sanity slowly unravels as his parents, and the rest of the world pushes him into a bloody horror.

title: Double Deception
description: When something precious is stolen from you, your goal is not only to get it back but wonder what their motivation was for stealing it in the first place. Especially when you have a lot to lose and consider your deep dark secrets.

title: Manigances: Notice Rouge
description: The 2e season picks up 10 months after the events that concluded season one. Jonathan must face his demons. Find the person responsible for the death of his friend and colleague Dan Portal. With the help of a new teammate, Alex, our hero must interrogate and protect three key witnesses ... A game of cat and mouse begins between police and suspects ... Seedy hotel ... surveillance cameras ... an assassin called 'the Hand' ... Who will crack first? Who will die? 72 hours to find the truth.

title: Blooming Flowers
description: In modern day New York City a ninety eight year old women lies helpless on her death bed. As her granddaughter begins to take on the chores of cleaning the apartment, she comes upon a story that her grandmother had been writing. It is the story of Blooming Flowers. The account is from her younger days as a journalist of her 1935 trip to a remote village hidden along the border of China and Cambodia. It is a place where mysticism and the spiritual unknown weave the lives of the village's inhabitants into a conflict amongst themselves over the secretive past of the land. Unable to stop reading her grandmother's journal she begins to notice strange happenings around her as the grandmother begins to repeat "He is here, he is here, he is here". Who has come for the grandmother, and what is the connection to the spiritual and destructive powers from the Village decades ago?

title: Raw Cut
description: A long weekend in the remote Wyoming mountains exposes a group of friends to an evil they never saw coming.

title: Discarded
description: After finding a terminally ill man with a fortune and no heirs, a desperate young mother hatches a plan to hide her children in the crawl space of his lavish home while she lives upstairs and waits for him to die. She soon discovers he is hiding a far bigger secret.

title: Bunker 6
description: In an alternate timeline where the atomic bombs go off in 1962, young Grace enters a whole new sheltered existence. 10 years later, the nuclear bunker she calls home is crumbling around her.

title: Paragon II
description: Paragon II (sequel to 2010's multiple-award nominee PARAGON) continues the adventures of Augustus 'Paragon' Carr and his sidekick, Corliss Erman, as they search for the son of a missing millionaire. Along the way, they will learn about Augustus's murky past, as well as discovering a betrayal they never could have imagined.

title: Interjú
description: A young woman applying for a job is targeted as the next victim by a cold-blooded murderer.

title: Theatre of the Dead
description: A dance troupe trapped in their theatre by the Zombie Apocalypse discover that the threat doesnt just lie beyond the chained doors, and that there are indeed worse things than being torn apart by critics.

title: Red Runway
description: Once on the verge of success, Rachel witnessed her dream shatter, while those around her revealed in her spotlight.

title: Raqt
description: After death of her sister and her brother in law Sonia adopts their daughter Suhani.Sonia gives all live to Suhani so she doesn't miss her parents.But his has a wrong effect on Suhani as she gets obsessed by Sonia and will not allow anyone come between them.

title: Der blinde Fleck
description: The true story of a journalist who investigates the backgrounds of the Oktoberfest terror attack of 1980.

title: Zurück auf Ende
description: Bobby wakes up in a hotel and doesn't remember anything before his waking. He has to discover the truth in a painful journey to himself.

title: Të Mjerët
description: A clash of two cultures, one primitive and the other exotic wild and cunning, but both of them with a violence and crime story, will face with each other in a house.

title: All or Nothing
description: Some games are played for fun, some are played for power, but this game is played for ultimate stakes. In the underground world of ultimate poker, only one person walks out a winner, but win or lose, sometimes winning just isn't enough.

title: Shades
description: Three young tourists buy a sunglass camera to record their trip to Los Angeles -- and get mixed up in a drug deal gone wrong.

title: Horror Filmed: The Poe Experiment
description: Found footage that takes place at the world's largest haunted house in Kansas City, Mo.

title: Dr. Shocker's Vault of Horror
description: "Vault of Horror" is a "shock-u-mentary" celebrating our fascination with movie monsters, featuring celebrities like Guillermo del Toro and Rob Zombie.

title: Night Witness
description: After two roommates receive dark messages that they suspect are related to the disappearance of young couple, they quickly become wrapped up trying to solve a mystery where both of them soon realize that something evil is hard at work.

title: A Pact
description: In early-1980s East Germamy, Paul tricked Georg into handing over his girlfriend Anna to him, but they made a pact that stipulated that Georg could have her back at any time. Years later, Paul and Anna are successful and happily-married with two children. Then Georg reappears, and he has not forgotten the pact.

title: All Things
description: All Things The Movie is an exhilarating roller-coaster of life events, Love and the Friendship of five friends, discovered and shaped by the bounds of their very Faith in God and their ability to learn how to trust in Him and each other.

title: Night Terrors
description: Phil Harlan is a former businessman who has been paralyzed in a car accident. While on a vacation to a cabin with his attendants, Katrina and Cyrus, he begins having horrifying night terrors of demonic creatures and other visions that haunt his waking hours. As the story goes on, the dark choices of Phil's past bubble to the surface, and he comes face to face with his past misdeeds.

title: Unblinded
description: Two dark forces entangle an 18 year old American gamer. She resides with an evil entity influencing her animus towards all. Then enters Jin.

title: Matroska
description: In an old, tumbled-down apartment block, 'The Man', paralyzed with fear, watches a video-tape playing footage of himself, apparently trapped in an unremitting loop of deadly cat and mouse chases, hunted and pursued by clones of himself.

title: Densely Hollow
description: A fugitive rehabilitates a young genius at the cusp of a technological breakthrough while evading the cross-hair of the world's greatest superpower.

title: A.D.N., l'âme de la terre
description: Akim is a young uneducated Tunisian born with the gift of healing. Confronted by an unscrupulous pharmaceutical company who seeks to profit from his gift, Akim realizes that his unique blood chemistry can either be used as a weapon of mass destruction or to help save his people from a global pandemic.

title: Networking
description: The film follows three teenage girls as they return home after a night out, full of heavy drinking and hard partying. When the girls arrive home together, they end up playing host to some very unwelcome guests.

title: Is Am Are: A Reason to Live For
description: 3 Short Stories on the lives 3 unrelated ones. WHAT IF: a story about Songyos, an IT guy who thinks he could do anything he wants with his life no matter if it's right or wrong. THE SHADOW: Mali, a mysterious woman who's never realize how happy her life would be. FAY: a hidden secret of a rock star waiting to be uncovered

title: All Roads Lead
description: One man's investigation into the death of two young girls, brings exposure to the ominous cloud of deceit and economic depression time has left on a small, Midwestern town.

title: El edificio
description: In Mexico City, there is a building where even today supernatural events take place. It is apparently just another building, but those who venture inside it know that something is very different. A desperate woman comes to a building where she faces supernatural events that push her to the edge.

title: Devils in the Darkness
description: Mike is studying for his med school entrance exams, and wants a job that will leave him time to study. He is hired to help Mr. Pinborough, a wealthy recluse who lives in the woods, and requires constant care. Mike's job is to assist the head caregiver Robin. Soon, he is haunted by dark creatures and things hit a peak when Robin disappears.

title: The Mercury Conspiracy
description: After her son is fatally poisoned from tainted black market food, a woman falls deeply in love with the suave businessman who is secretly responsible for trafficking the poisoned food that killed her child.

title: Saturnalia
description: Inspired by a shocking true event, "Saturnalia" tells the story of Edey, a homeless woman who manages to sneak in and live undetected in the house of a recently retired man after the sudden death of his wife.

title: Escape from Uganda
description: A woman gets framed for a crime that she didn't commit. And it is up to her husband to save her from the notorious Uganadan prison.

title: Homeless
description: This film revolves around an orphaned boy who lost his father when two robbers broke into his home. The robbers kill the boy's father, and he must search for the killers to be at peace.

title: Villain
description: Arnab,an honest and upright PWD road inspector.Things take a turn after authorities frame corruption charges against him and send him to jail. Meanwhile, his wife also gets killed. A victimized Arnab now on a mission to avenge the culprits who changed his life .

title: Twice
description: Two women, bound to one another, both with the hopes and dreams of a better life, struggle with the events of the past, behaviours of the present, each following the other towards the same destiny.

title: Makua Charley
description: Young and innocent Karen Palmer visits Hawaii and is seduced by a charming local man who sometimes turns into a shark-man and might want to eat her.

title: Wak-Wak
description: A small town community is in disarray against under aged criminals the law could not touch. Their favorite victim is a sweet 15 year old girl whose father is helpless to protect her, but a harrowing twist of fate finds these thugs to cross path with a winged creature who is more than eager to lure them into her lair.

title: Paraphobia
description: A collection of recorded video-evidence from the PeepingTom murder trial-Kevin, an unsuccessful filmmaker becomes obsessed with beautiful actress, Nikki Navarro, and is soon filming her every move. We quickly learn that Kevin is keeping a horrifying secret, and a shocking revelation in Nikki's bedroom leads down a rabbit hole of sexual perversion and homicide.

title: Kroab Pich
description: Rith and Sovan were once childhood buddies, but they've drifted apart after growing up. The former has drifted into crime, while the other has unwillingly become a cop, despite his lifelong ambitions of becoming a pop star. Their best friend's death and a botched diamond heist somehow brought them back together, as the pair embark on a high-octane journey across Cambodia's rural roads in the company of a mobster's moll - and with her violent boyfriend at their heels.

title: Inception of a lost Art
description: A mysterious man of a certain age, challenges a woman to his art. A world very much unseen, is only answered by the beginning of like-minded thoughts.

title: Desolate
description: Shot over a 3 year period during free weekends and in between his 2nd feature 'Mon Ami' with NO crew and NO script, Desolate is an example of experimental film-making using resources that are available to anyone that can afford a camera. The film follows a young man who hits rock bottom after suspecting his best friend may be responsible for his failed relationship. But when a mysterious incident rocks the downtown core, they are forced to put differences aside in order to survive the night...

title: Hell at Heathridge
description: Obsessed with obscure modern tragedies, wealthy Mr. Yates hires five college drama students to recreate a murder-suicide that occurred on their campus 20 years ago. As the actors prepare for the show of their lives, unfortunate events follow them and by the end they realize one thing . . . Evil is Real!

title: Po tu storonu
description: The team of the TV reality show "Beyond" who looking the evidence or refutation of paranormal phenomena decides to spend the night in abandoned science institute, where are mysterious phenomena take place.

title: Imago
description: What if the world that you have built and where you feel safe was questioned by those you have always trusted? What would you do if you had to face a dilemma because you were betrayed by your own confidant? Would you choose to fight for the custody of your son or to stay close to your imaginary friends you confide in? Would you choose reality or an imaginary world? Paranoia is not a persecution vaccine.

title: Powerplegic
description: Jeremy Moore, a computer genius, was brutally mangled by a vicious gang. The outcome of this savage act causes Jeremy to become a quadriplegic. However, unbeknownst to the young genius, he has developed telekinesis. Through his new-found powers he let's out a fury of revenge. This spawned 'POWERPLEGIC'.

title: Bhadaas
description: A detective with training in criminal psychology aids the local police's hunt for a female serial killer who seduces unfaithful husbands before murdering them.

title: Impulse
description: Jenny is a young woman struggling to cast away suspicion after she commits a murder. As she tries to figure out a way to escape she must remain close to the Detective in charge of the investigation while looking for advice from an old friend of hers.

title: Terminal Happiness
description: A newlywed couple's happiness is interrupted when their extended families make claims on the couple's recently attained fortune ... resulting in a series of unexplained murders.

title: Bangles
description: Romantic Horror Suspense Thriller.

title: Natural Rejection
description: A mysterious man made 'Cure' starts to kill off all of the women on the planet.

title: Eine verhängnisvolle Nacht
description: After beating and raping his girlfriend, teacher Bernd (Brandt) was convicted. After his imprisonment, he stalks Hannah (Silke Bodenbender) again; she has destroyed his life. With her children, Hannah flees from her obsessed ex.

title: The Vacation House
description: Six reckless and troubled teenagers are forced to spend their weekends together in a Vacation House. Because of their internal problems and difficulties dealing with their feelings, since all of them have lost people in their families, they are constantly in conflict with each other. With the goal of improving their relationships, they are sent to a vacation house for one weekend. However, there is something very strange with the house. In the first night, when they decide to tell horror stories, something unexpected happens, because these become reality and they start to die in the same way of the characters in their horror stories. To survive, they need to remain together, while they realize that the truth hidden in the house is way darker and scary than what they could have ever imagined.

title: Roulette
description: Sina, a young homeless girl, who has lost her parents at a car accident, gets offered the once in a lifetime opportunity to play Russian roulette in front of an paying audience.

title: Dilli Gang
description: Dilli Gang is the story of an old man targeted by a dangerous gang which preys on senior citizens living alone. The film is based on true incidents of increasing murders of aged men and women staying alone in metropolitan cities.

title: The Amateur
description: A man with major money problems takes a job as an amateur assassin killing strangers to pay his bills.

title: Transfusion
description: A Vampire with very specific taste becomes entwined with 3 different situations where she turns out to be both their savior and their demise.

title: Surviving Evidence
description: Following on the heels of the film, "Please, talk with me", comes: Surviving Evidence. This paranormal thriller is set in the present and seeks to raise as many questions in the viewers' minds as it may answer -- acting as a 'what if' exercise in regard to the relevancy, morality and application of paranormal experience in relation to free will, societal customs and what the future may hold.

title: Suburbanite
description: Late one night on his way home from work John falls asleep at the wheel and hits a man that is walking in the road. He takes the body home, fully intending to hide the body and cover up the incident when the unthinkable occurs. The man he hit wakes up. And now John must decide how far he is willing to go to protect his secret.

title: Juvenile Transgressions
description: His life changed when his father came in town... For the worse.

title: Ridge War Z
description: The last surviving veterans of the worst battle of a zombie war recount their horrific memories to an author who is writing a book about their experiences.

title: Perdedores Natos
description: Juan is a loser. He lives in a rented house without money nor a job...till he finds Antonio, an old friend who has become in a drug dealer. Taking part in a fiddle, Juan will steal a suitcase for Antonio, and his life will suffer a twist.

title: Psychic
description: A notorious mob boss(Mr. Zambrelli) takes a gifted psychic hostage. Mr. Zambrelli wants the psychic to help him find his kidnapped daughter. It's life or death. The psychic will have to give the reading of his life.

title: Dead Man's Bluff
description: In the seedy underbelly of 1950's Los Angeles, Jim Carson is about to close the biggest deal of his career as a Realtor. His client is the notorious kingpin, Arden Price, who is looking for a warehouse to expand his unsavory operations. When Jim Carson meets Arden's stunning and seductive wife, Aria, the attraction is instant, and he can't resist mixing business with pleasure. Their subsequent, torrid affair comes to a screeching halt however when Aria gives Jim a dire ultimatum. Aria tells him that for their love to continue, they must conspire to get her husband out of the picture... permanently. Arden Price is no fool; his discovery of Jim and Aria's true relationship is inevitable. And when he does find out that his new business associate has been making time with his wife... it won't be pretty. Before Jim can blink, he's dragged into a world of temptation, betrayal and murder. The lovers hatch a plan to dispense of the ruthless gangster. But as they soon find out, plans have a way of falling by the wayside.

title: Dying to Live
description: Alive past his 'death day', Andrew is hunted so the wrong can be corrected, all while finding that life is finally worth fighting for.

title: The Play
description: The film revolves around a theatre group where the entire group members gets devastated by a series of murders.

title: Do You Truss Me?
description: Interlocking stories about sex, control and paranoia.

title: Real Jinro Game
description: Nine people are locked in a secret room. The nine people are complete strangers. From a speaker, "Werewolf killed and ate the village people" comes out. Blood splatters from a man's neck. The eight remaining people panic. A man in a mask then appears and announces that the Jinro (Werewolf) game is starting. The people locked in the room finally realize they do have something in common. All of them were involved in some way with idol star Ena Eto's death. Her body was found a few days ago.

title: Anaheim the Film
description: Tells the story of Anaheim and a distraught single mother and her five year old daughter who are called upon to posthumously rid this city of its ghost.

title: Shaada Kalo Aabcha
description: The sylvan settings of North Bengal where light and shade play amid the somber lines of conifers and eucalyptus. The winding serpentine roads curling along a green mountain like lazy laces. Perhaps the ideal place for a game of black, white and grey. A writer comes to Kolkakham with his trophy wife for a holiday. In a most unexpected place he is run down by a car and goes into coma. He wakes up in a hospital after 3 days to an inspector questioning his identity. The only things he remembers are his name Samrat Ray, his wife's name Sayani and the hotel they are staying at. Inspector Chettri takes him to his wife who refuses to recognize him. Instead she introduces them to her husband and their friends. Now begins a perfect mind game to solve a riddle that keeps taking the protagonist to people and places where he keeps getting trapped in the intrigues of lies, deceit and betrayal. Welcome back to a new age Hitchcockian genre.

title: Enter the Dominion
description: Jonathan Zander is known for his take no prisoners business attitude. Under suspicion from a previous business deal, Zander must find a new, trustworthy face for his organization. When Zander meets the incredible talented, yet socially challenged, Sheldon Marcus, Zander finds the perfect tool to funnel his next shady business deal through. The effects of this new deal can cause irreparable damage, but Zander will stop at nothing to increase his profits. After leaving a life of mediocrity and insignificance, Sheldon must decide if he will participate in the deconstruction of society, or attempt to take down one of the most connected and dangerous business moguls in the world

title: Potomanto
description: An angry ex-police officer's mission to catch cheating women turns fatal when he stumbles into a diabolical plot of 'illegal organ harvesting' and the young hustlers who are lured into making deadly sacrifices for a chance abroad.

title: I Am Atheist
description: The follow-up to 'The Witnesses', I Am Atheist stars Antonio DiLoreto, who realizes that the plague of Jehovah's Witnesses have not been defeated and that the home invasion was only just the beginning of their diabolical plan. With his best friend David missing for two weeks, the Jehovah's Witnesses have nearly fulfilled their prophecy by forcefully converting everyone on earth to their religion. Being the last man on earth, Antonio sets on a journey to rescue David from the Jehovahs and fight for the forgotten right to choose your spiritual beliefs.

title: Dysphoria
description: It stars Michael Denk as Tinker Tock, a crazed writer on the brink of suicide whom soon finds himself in a nightmare world where his greatest fears come to life. Joined by Robert the Delivery Man (Aaron Sibila), the two search for Tinker's lover Evelyn Rose (Michelle Brockman), while being pursued by a killer Pig Man (Zach Mclain) who will stop at nothing to destroy them.

title: Omission
description: A deep crisis will lead a psychiatrist to the extreme decision of "cleanse" society. His path will cross Santiago Murray, a priest who has just returned to Buenos Aires, willing to assist the needy people of his neighborhood.

title: The Castle Project
description: As an architect begins renovations to convert an old castle to a hotel;he uncovers more than he was expecting. He and his team of contractors experience hauntings and find what could be a portal to the afterlife.

title: The Return of Elias Urquijo
description: A young couple has rented an old, remote house by the Mediterranean sea for the summer. There they meet Elias Urquijo, an enigmatic children books writer, whom they quickly befriend. However, something in the house seems to react to the presence of the guests, something that is trying to warn them about the true identity of Elias and what are his real intentions.

title: Blackout
description: A young attorney's life is turned upside when he wakes to find a dead woman in his apartment.

title: Open House
description: At a high school party, when the most popular jock in school is found dead, a shy student must find the killer before the night is out to save the girl of his dreams.

title: Sen Üzülme
description: Iki çocuklu dul bir kadinin ikinci evliliginde yasadigi büyük imtihani ve bir adamin vicdan muhasebesinin anlatildigi bir film.

title: White Lie
description: A young writer has his book stolen by his mentor.

title: Babie leto
description: The story takes place on the outskirts of Slovakia, "east of paradise". The humanly proud and cowardly protagonist, punished with involuntary imprisonment, returns through the infamous Roma "reservation"

title: Ashes of the Phoenix
description: This story surrounds Jeremiah Bennett and Jacobi Gains; two college students that have managed to escape their tragic past with the exception of a few loose ends. When Jacobi and Jeremiah end up at the same school and cross paths, they will discover that they have more in common than they could ever imagine and will need help from a few misfits to rid themselves of their troubles for good. Friendship, courage and love find our heroes in this life changing adventure.

title: Underbelly
description: This is the story from the underbelly of one gritty city and the dirty business it's home to. The price one family has to pay, for being so close to its very core. Jacob Benning is left with no choice but to betray his business partners and do some hard time inside.When he comes home, he discovers his wife gone and his daughter kidnapped, by the very people that put him away. He goes on a vicious rampage of revenge to find his daughter and bring those responsible to justice and a bloody end. Through the barrio and the desert, the blood is in the dust and the writing is on the wall.

title: The American Templars
description: Based on a best-selling novel Cabal of the Westford Knight by David S. Brody, this film explores the possibility that a group of Knights Templar explored New England and left clues to the greatest treasure in history in their wake. The Church will do anything to keep these secrets and two reluctant treasure hunters are drawn into the adventure of a lifetime. Shot on location with actual unexplained sites and artifacts, The American Templars will excite the mind and raise questions about faith, history, and the things that unite us all.

title: New Turns
description: This is a drama about the subject of child trafficking.

title: Gucheng hui
description: A historical thriller set during the waning years of Imperial China, Sworn Brothers is a story of brotherhood, sacrifice and honor. It is 1905 in the eve of the Chinese revolution and tension is in the air. Hou is sent by the emperor to the city of Fengtian to capture the leader of the revolutionary forces, code named Baihu, whose identity is not known, not even to his own followers. Hou meets his younger sworn brother Lei, the commander of the forces of Fengtian, whom he had not seen for years. Hou has received reports that Baihu is bringing 'Lotus Heart' from Japan to use against the Imperial government... Who is Baihu ? What is 'Lotus Heart?' And what is the diabolical plan?

title: Saturday Night Chills
description: Three friends are in their quarter life crisis. Seeking adventure and thrills, they spend most of their weekend nights on brothels and night clubs. One night, an unexpected incident will change their lives permanently.

title: A Political Murder
description: The Maharastra Scam and student Politics in Kolkata.

title: Travis Jenkins
description: 'Travis Jenkins' follows a suburb father, Eric who is pushed to his limit when his daughter Jess falls in with a dangerous gang of hoodlums led by Travis Jenkins, a ruthless meth dealer. A series of tragic events occur leaving Eric to take matters into his own hands as he tracks down each gang member one by one, until his daughter is safe.

title: Hell's Caretaker
description: First he took care of the house; then he took care of the people.

title: Vacation Hunter
description: The film centres around the trials and tribulations of two back-packing friends, as they take an unwilling journey down a river, and into the heart and history of the industrial revolution. With all the violence, ferocity and decadence of a misspent youth, the boys will learn a life lesson or two before they reach the other side.

title: Midnight Showdown
description: MIDNIGHT SHOWDOWN is a suspense-thriller with countless twists and turns. A group of office workers, including the company's CEO, gathered in a midnight office to settle a problem; how to fake an accidental death of the guy whom one of them had just killed. They finally reached a solution, but it turned out that the situation was far more complicated than they expected...

title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Motion Picture Odyssey
description: The epic documentary behind the making of the greatest Mystery Science Theater 3000 feature film ever made, regardless if only one Mystery Science Theater 3000 feature film exists.

title: Ingloda: The Possession Within
description: One girl's mysterious past leaves her with unresolved issues that begin to haunt her everyday life, while her friends try to save her from herself. Her journey in the rel world ends when Ingloda begins.

title: Keeping up with the Joneses: The Movie
description: When the Jones family is kidnapped, four residents from the Green Meadows Mental Facility go on a mission to rescue them.

title: Landlocked
description: A newly married couple decides to purchase a home in the country. Things aren't as they seem when they find squatters living on their new land.

title: Collage
description: Benjamin, a 15 year old boy, is going through a mental breakdown caused by bullies, cameras and internet communities. While the older generation deliberately turn their backs toward the problem, Benjamin needs to find his own redemption.

title: A Shakespearean Tragedy
description: Three friends and a drugged out gun dealer decide to rob a bank, nothing goes as planned.

title: Uncut
description: Deliverance meets Blair Witch in this art house thriller UNCUT A Canadian couple goes missing on their vacation camping trip in the remote mountains of Montana. Years later evidence of their last living existence is discovered on a damaged video camera's hard-drive. The recovered footage documents their final few hours in a dangerous deadly game of survival. Terrorized, traumatized and tested to their limits the couple is chased into the wilderness by two back-woods locals who discover the couple's home-video camera and continue making a movie of their own. Filming their disturbing pursuit the locals give chase with chilling consequences in a gritty raw and rowdy race to their ultimate end.

title: #Realmovie
description: Eva Binoff, the most famous actress of Spanish cinema, must face the most important role of her life. His sister has been kidnapped in a sinister film game. 90 min to be found, or she will die. A kidnapped actress, an actress in her search and cameras broadcasting everything in real time.

title: Sweet Leaf
description: Billy and Steve have to get some money to pay off their drug dealer Tyvan. Their plan to rob a Carwash gets complicated when the plan gets shared and everyone has an ulterior motive. Crime/drama with a supernatural edge.

title: The Remnants
description: 'The Remnants' tells the story of a single mother and teenage daughter struggling to make sense of paranormal happenings in their home. A seemingly friendly spirit follows Katie, the daughter, home from a friend's, but the interactions soon become more and more malicious. With the help of friends, they realize this is no typical haunting.

title: Naari Chakra
description: The story revolves around the chakras of women trafficking and women empowerment in the society, with a message for all women to never give up and fight back. The film highlights a story of a girl being abducted and forcefully introduced into the prostitution racket. Her brother who is an army officer unravels her kidnapping, and gets her out of the whole underground plot. The story then moves on to the healing part of the protagonist, her intellectual fight against the society, and rehabilitation by instilling yogic values in Sandhya.

title: Persephone
description: Four seemingly everyday people from different walks of life cross paths after receiving a mysterious phone call. They do not know why they were called together, but upon meeting their perceptions of the world unknowingly change. Using these unseen revelations they begin to resolve their dark pasts. Some for the better, others for the worst. Linked through the corruption of a single Pharmaceutical Company, these four people embark on a day they will never forget.

title: Nobody in Particular
description: An unnamed man and woman travel in a stolen car with a suitcase full of money. When the vehicle breaks down, the two are forced to part ways.

title: The Assignment 1.0
description: Enticed by wealth and frightened by evil, Jewish attorney Nathan Ganzer's life changes when he is unexpectedly detained by the French Counter Terrorist Unit (CTU) and forced to endure an intense interrogation. The agents accuse him of aiding suspected Arab terrorists and skillfully manipulate Ganzer into believing he will be implicated in the next attack.

title: Red Sky
description: When four thieves for hire break into a remote research facility on what they think is a routine job, they uncover something that threatens to destroy everything around them.

title: Hangman's Noose
description: This is the story of a man taken out of his time and through foreign science becomes a hybrid killing machine, except he has turned on his makers and is altering the scope of the political world. With alien technology, he has become an inhuman avenger as he gets entangled in the lives of many who had once believed he was a myth.

title: Le nouveau locataire
description: Trelkovsky moves into an apartment whose previous tenant jumped out of the window. The young man witnesses increasingly mysterious phenomena and becomes the victim of his neighbors.

title: Third Row Centre
description: Disillusioned by his soul destroying job and repetitive lifestyle, a lonely telephone operator embarks on a new voyeuristic obsession.

title: Canyon Road
description: Matt and Jessie are swept off Malibu Canyon Road by a landslide. Buried in their car at the bottom of the Canyon, can their love be enough for them to survive as time and oxygen run out?

title: What's left of life
description: A psychological thriller with many ups and downs involved where feelings such as love and hate, nostalgia, infidelity, violence, resentment, loneliness and death

title: Redshift
description: Our story follows a young woman by the name of Stella Morris who is recruited by REDSHIFT INC., and through various assignments comes to terms with its grand and sinister purpose, its treacherous employees, and her new-found role as a corporate entropist.

title: Touch of the Devil
description: A young family buys a rundown old Victorian house with the intention of renovating it, only to discover that something evil lurks within.

title: The Final 4
description: A pair of working class stiffs kidnap the son of San Francisco's most feared gangster only to find out that the father doesn't want him back.

title: The Retribution
description: A murder reunites a group of old high school friends. This unfortunate reunion has re-ignited the hatred between them as jealousy and bitterness from their past comes to fruition. Each one with a motive seeking their revenge.

title: Wherever
description: The story revolves around a girl who comes home after a long journey without a memory of her past and a woman called Matilda, who has taken care of her since childhood.

title: Zealot
description: An urban ascetic, haunted by his past, walks a line between pious devotion and religious fanaticism while trying to find his place in the world.

title: The Green Jacket
description: The film is set in present times. In the suburbs of the city a 7 years old child disappears. After a month of ineffective searches boy's older sister decides to take the deal over. She is confident that she knows who kidnapped her brother. Despair, guiltiness and powerlessness - is that enough to justify a terrible revenge?

title: Death O'Lantern II
description: Phobe runs a "Halloween House" for troubled teenagers, who have a hard time dealing with the holiday and the town of "Sleepy Hollow Heights" bloody past.

title: Dumar
description: Fund Manager 'Dumar' is on a personal quest against his employer, a corrupt fund manager whom has framed him for fraud, however unknown to both parties they both have ulterior motive.

title: Thulli Vilayadu
description: Three friends with different goals want to make it big in their life. They come across a huge sum of money belonging to the local politician who sends a thug after them to retrieve the money.

title: Wild Beast Contract
description: Two young guys follow the order of their company to meet a VIP man and attempt the way to obtain his signature in the billion contract. While they are waiting at the hotel, they decide to find a charming woman and have fun. Unexpectedly, the VIP man enjoys "the luxurious girl" who they selected. So that they discover the way to force her to be "a bait" and make him sign in the contract. But the truth is gradually revealed.

title: Day of Terror
description: A man tries to be a good Samaritan, and is robbed for his effort.

title: Kuolemanvietti
description: Two estranged brothers are forced to fight and pursue an overwhelmingly dangerous force.

title: Preserve
description: 170 years after a disaster has driven humanity underground, a group of four emerge to the surface and seek safe harbor in an unwelcoming world.

title: Tolbiac
description: One night out in Tolbiac, Time starts to rewind itself.

title: Imbroglio
description: Sophisticated plotting combines with vivid, but highly flawed characters in this fast moving tale of double- and triple-crosses. A writer with a husband she no longer wants, a step-sister with a grudge that can only end in violence, a charming but lethal sex trafficker and a cop whose job has cost him his wife and his daughter find themselves entwined in a complicated series of events that become darker and more frightening as the story spirals toward its bloody conclusion.

title: The Island Memories
description: Facing writer's block, an author attempts to ignore his urge to drink and the vivid memories of his past. Shot and hand-cut on 16mm (both B&W and color) film, this short alternative fiction reminds us that not everything is as it seems.

title: Tilt
description: Paul hasn't connected with his daughter for over 10 years, but when their world is turned upside down by an unthinkable act, he has to decide what's more important: doing the right thing or setting things right?

title: The Means
description: When an emotionally damaged young man befriends the girl across the street, he learns that her charming demeanor conceals something more sinister.

title: El esquema de Ponzi
description: THE STORY Manuel returns to Buenos Aires after spending ten years in Europe and meets his high school friends, amongst them Mariano who is married to Cecilia . The three of them were close friends. Mariano is undergoing a financial crisis that Cecilia is not aware of and he can only gasp at Manu, who returns from Europe as a millionaire. Manu asks Mariano to participate in a business deal that seems both promising and risky. Together, they will start up a financial deal which should bring them a million dollars each, a kind of fraud perpetrated against Daniel and Gabriel. Nevertheless, the situation gets out of hands and jealousy, betrayal and the past take center stage.

title: Emma!
description: Emma is a mysterious, social outcast who becomes the victim of a cruel practical joke at the hands of four popular kids. The results are tragic for everyone involved. Emma, with Mr. Chuckles, Mr. Hood, Angelique, and other "friends" begins a reign of terror on a small town. In the meantime Chief O'Reilly, dealing with his own haunted past, races to stop the bloodshed.

title: Sospese
description: Alessandro sees the beautiful Caterina, a woman he knows little about. Luca sees Carlotta every so often, a woman who appears and reappears in his house when she feels like it. What Alessandro and Luca are not aware of, is that Caterina and Carlotta are (apparently) twin sisters. The two women meet regularly in what remains of their old home. Caterina is a victim of her sister Carlotta's continual blackmailing, forcing her to steal money and valuables objects from Alessandro's house. Caterina and Carlotta agree on the fact that it is now time for them to 'make a break'. Salvatore is a private investigator who, looking for a missing young woman, Letizia, believes he recognizes her in Caterina and in Carlotta.

title: Suburban Madness
description: A collection of short horror films about crazy suburban people that are introduced by introduced a country crazy Eli Schrieder.

title: Go, Stop, Murder
description: Popular card game 'Go, Stop' becomes horrific in this thriller, as a group of players in the countryside start to die one-by-one. Yet when a substitute player is brought in, he begins to think that the game itself is the source of the problem.

title: The Reincarnation of Jesse Belle
description: A retired Marshall, who has been recently been diagnosed with cancer, shares a story with old friends that has never been told to no one. He tells the story of an unsolved crime of a serial killer who's fetish was saran wrap, which was found on the victims. His buddies are amazed that he was sharing this story and the details of it. Finally, ending it as a joke saying, Gotcha. The friends are puzzled. Leaving one to wonder: Did someone get away with murder? Did this really happen?

title: Miradas Furtivas
description: Sorel es un joven ejecutivo que labora en una importante empresa; por imagen y también por gusto, él busca un lugar agradable para vivir. Ya instalado en su nuevo departamento en una colonia pudiente, es testigo de una escena violenta que cambiara el destino de su vida.

title: Parallel Maze
description: Parallel Maze The story begins with one of Hitchcock's master work -- Psycho, which depicts a female bank clerk who stole a huge sum of money from the bank and fled to a hotel, and what happened later. As time and space begin to split, the relations between the two couples in the film turn complicated, and all ends in the maze existing in the parallel universe. The theme of the film centers on Arthur Schopenhauer's idea -- "The world is my will", and the structure form bases on the multiverse theory. The splitting of science and culture has been a worldwide issue ever since the 1960s when C.P. Snow delivered his famous speech on The Two Cultures. What will be revealed when we examine the traditional humanistic thoughts with advanced science and technology? Quantum Theory and Chaos Theory have put an end to our traditional cognition and forced us to rediscover the universe and ourselves. The core ideas of modern science like nonlinearity, indeterminacy, probability theory, etc, are well combined with the structure of the film as well as the destinies of the characters. The world and life presented in Parallel Maze is like the superposition of quantum, forming a mass of chaos. The film conveys the director's understanding and expectation on films in the 21 Century.

title: Colorless Green
description: After a domestic terrorist attack, a local high school computer hacker discovers a revolutionary new program that tracks down those responsible.

title: The Chosen Ones
description: Five humans, they thought were normal until the end of the world has arrived. Matt aka ' Clicker ', nickname given by her brother Boone. Matt a socially excluded, he convinces himself that has powers that can save the end of the world, this will immediately tell your brother. Boone high school socialite, Salt Hill, just to see the skills of his brother, together are rescued by a girl with long blond hair, which also had abilities, Alex. And by a doctor who knew their genes and had all the answers to Matt. Later meets two sisters who also had skills, Rachel, that will create a bond of friendship with Boone. Tess, a great fighter. Joined in a grand adventure to save the world.

title: MotorBanker
description: A trailer-like video about the superhero MotorBanker, a former legendary bank robber.

title: Hide N Seek
description: Mi-young is playing hide-and-seek with a doll. Oh-gun lives hiding his dark history and Min-su follows Oh-gun to revenge. One day, destiny of these three was entwined, and their story begins.

title: Evil Deeds 3
description: The Hermit is given a ride by an old trucker and tells him tales of Evil Deeds.

title: Terapie pentru crimã
description: A beginner hit man has to overcome a great challenge: it's a she.

title: Nobody Comes Nobody Goes
description: What if an old pal of yours or the person you have been married for years starts to think that you are not "you"? And what if you are no longer "you" at that moment? Or, while all this is happening, what if, you are confronted with the "you" that could not be "you"?

title: Young Harvest
description: An enthusiastic internet celebrity, Bryce Ryder, throws the party of a lifetime in celebration of his 100th video- yet an unexpected guest plots to murder everyone in attendance.

title: Man in the Street
description: MITS follows the misadventures of Kuda, TV's newest and biggest reality television star. Kuda is left alone in a house for 6 months and expected to defend the house against intruders sent in to steal specified items - recreating the true suburban living experience. The problem comes when Kuda is forced to kill one of these intruders and much to the dismay of the authorities, our new-found murderer is heralded by the viewing public as a true icon of his generation, creating television ratings as never seen before... a vicious moral catch-22.

title: Criminal: Become Vengeance
description: After his wife is murdered, Innis decides to take the law into his own hands. But as he comes closer to catching the man that killed his wife, Innis discovers the dark side of justice and finds the will to never look back.

title: Blinded by Love Film
description: Nikki Henderson thought Jacob Meyers was the perfect guy for her. However in this film, perfection doesn't exist.

title: 12 Segundos
description: After the disappearance of her boss, Selma feels the need to go find him. She travels to the mountains where she discovers a murder. Destiny forces her to face her fears and she learns that only a couple of seconds are enough to get over them.

title: Online
description: Two teenagers are enjoying a night in when they find themselves plagued by a mysterious caller.

title: A Demon in My View
description: Leah, a freshman at Nolan University, is struggling through life, haunted by memories of her tragic past. 10 years prior, her parents were brutally murdered. The only clue left behind by the shadowy murderer was a quote by Edgar Allan Poe. Now, people in Leah's life are dying mysterious deaths, and once again Edgar Allan Poe poems are left at the crime scenes. Has the Dark Figure from Leah's past come back to haunt her yet again? Leah must make the connection between her past and her present, and learn to trust her instincts once again before it is too late.

title: Do No Harm
description: Where does good end and evil begin? When do good intentions do no good? There's a fine line between good and evil. If pushed to your limits would you cross over into evil?

title: Cryptogram
description: An internet terrorist creates a computer source code based on the DNA of a junkie. The new code has the ability to mutate and adapt to any computer environment just like organisms can adapt. The terrorist must destroy any genetic remains on the junkie to keep the key to her code a secret. Her plan is to control the information infrastructure of the world. Mary Gilbert, head of the FBI Internet Investigations Division, her team and her maladroit nephew are on the case.

title: Mirror Images 2
description: Following the traumatic events of the past year, Madelyn (Heather Marie) finds solace in therapist Dr. Medtower (Patricia Ellis) to help stop the nightmares of Melissa returning. While mending the wounds, Madelyn finds it is those closest to her that she cannot trust and must now deal with the suspicious disappearance of her best friend.

title: Chemical 34
description: Follow one character, Larry Abberton, as he shifts from one dream state to another, each time dominated by a mysterious chemical 34.

title: The Investigation of a Time Traveler
description: A homeless schizophrenic physician, who claims he has invented a time machine, is being investigated by an unorthodox detective for the disappearance of his wife, Mia.

title: Overtime
description: Being the last person in the office does not always mean you're alone.

title: The Traffickers
description: Lynn Harrington, identical twin sister of slain kidnapped Teri, is herself taken by human traffickers who will harvest her organs for wealthy clients. Private Detective Stuart Tyrrell has only hours to find Lynn and save her from certain death.

title: Fear of Hue: The Movie
description: Fear of Hue Centers around a young writer in the later 1800's England, who discovers that he is being haunted by a hostile female Ghost. Henry, who is new to the Area is arranged to marry a Ill estate owner's daughter (Cathrine) before he passes away from his long-term Illness. Henry is now trying to discover what is real and what is fiction. The event that he writes down, seem to be actually happening. Henry is aught after each night by a Ghost who has fallen In love with him, however this ghost is the Sister of his wife. Fear of Hue The Movie is based on the short Story written by Niki Torch which was narrated by Daniel Radcliffe for the short film By Curtis Woodside.

title: The Field
description: There are many rumours surrounding Old Joe's Field. There always have been. Rumours about the disappearance of Old Joe's son long ago. The tales of what could possibly lurk in that field, beyond that fence. The stories of the noises people have heard or the things people have seen there in the dark. Then there is the challenge. It is a challenge of bravery. Many of the children are doing it. In the dead of night, whoever can stand at the fence to that field the longest is the bravest. It is a challenge that sounds simple, but, as three young friends are about to find out, may not be as easy as it seems. Especially when those rumours may actually be true...

title: Tell Me the truth
description: Elodie seeks the truth about the assassination of her parents. The local police give little assistance to her, accusing a vagrant homeless man, but this does not convince Elodie. With the support of her boyfriend, she meets the person who holds clues to the mystery from the beginning, a single mother named Beatrice, who lives with her baby. The late husband of Beatrice was linked to the death of Elodie's parents and this gives way to a path for Elodie and her boyfriend to follow for answers. As the plot deepens, a rift develops between Elodie and Beatrice, and the life of Beatrice's baby is threatened. Lies and the truth become commingled and the mystery unfolds in thick fog of deceit.

title: Genesis
description: Set in an alternate present day, people with super abilities known as "genesis subjects" are hunted down by the government as a larger political debate is happening worldwide. When a "hunter" comes face to face with an old friend who refuses to go quietly into the night, he's faced with his toughest mission yet. Discovering that he may just be a pawn in a much larger game. This is a gritty take on a world filled with people with super abilities. No costumes. No capes. Just a simple question... if someone you knew had special powers, does that mean that they still have the same rights as everyone else?

title: Summer's Winter
description: Summer Dalton's life changes forever when she witnesses her teenage sister's kidnapping. But when Summer begins investigating the crime, she uncovers truths better left buried.

title: Seeking
description: Melody, a mother of three supernatural daughters, is ambushed and left for dead while her children are hunted down by Locus, a maniacal militant obsessed with the girls' supernatural abilities. Although, Melody survives. She suffers from amnesia. An unlikely ally, Winter, temporarily disrupts Locus' plan while Melody regains her memory. The children encounter a maze of dangerous situations and are eventually captured but all the while Melody begins to regain her memory. Melody regains her memory and joins forces with her estranged sister, Marley, and vow to take revenge. In a head to head sequence, Melody and Marley take on the evil Locus and rescue the children.

title: Trail
description: Amir, an amateur journalist, gets his hands on one of the coded letters from one of the most heinous serial killers in the mid 1980's. With a body count of 50 and a letter count of over 500, to the press and police alike, in the last five months, this devious criminal certainly has an agenda on his mind. But what? Amir finds the answer to this first hand, as he achieves what no one else could. He decodes this latest letter and deduces its message as a simple invitation to an exclusive face to face interview. What this interview reveals, about not only the serial killer, but even a seemingly innocent amir forms the rest of the story.

title: Baal's Flowers
description: Since coming into possession of an old book, a botany student is haunted by strange dreams and hallucinations. Things get worse when a mysterious female student arrives at the University.

title: Outlast Playthrough
description: Combination of the series of Markiplier's "Outlast" playthrough.

title: The Thief of Faith
description: A lawyer, man of God, commences a friendship with a drug-addict trainer, putting at risk his life and heart. God says 'we are meant to give', but how much really?

title: Trauma
