description: A man suffers a psychological breakdown when he is pursued by a possible supernatural presence. Is it real or just a figment of his own trauma?

title: Vanish Playthrough
description: Combination of the series of Markiplier's "Vanish" playthrough.

title: Between Shadows
description: It's just Cassandra and her 1970 Chevy Nova on the empty night highway. While driving through the darkness she stops at a gas station, which has unsettling consequences.

title: A Nightmare to Remember: Volume 1
description: "A Nightmare to Remember: Volume 1" is a collection of independent horror shorts hosted by Miss Misery.

title: Leave to Stay
description: Three Kurdish immigrants arrive in the UK, as illegal aliens to seek asylum. Finding they now belong to London's underground.

title: Break Up
description: The film is a story which begins after a break up. A romantic thriller it shows the craze of a lover to get back his love and to what extent will he go for it.

title: Wheelchair Mary
description: This is a movie about a curse and the dangers of being a camper in the cursed woods.

title: Esperienza
description: A girl wakes up in a desert hotel. She can't get out. She can't see outside. But she has sufficient supplies of food and water. The girl is trapped inside. Alone, completely alone. A real independent movie! No production, no money! Only love for cinema and just one director, one crew, one camera. This is cinema!

title: Lost
description: Deep in exotic India, there is something wrong. An ordinary man must battle an immortal evil who wants to take over his body and his life.

title: Lucky in the Apocalypse
description: A cat and two young girls during the end of the world. Who will survive? Who will die?

title: Halation
description: Halation is a psychological thriller about a young photographer named Alex who moves into an old house in Seattle. It's the picture perfect place for him, it looks and feels like an antique, a relic from out of the past. Alex finds himself comforted by the timeless nature of the rooms and some of the old family heirlooms that still populate the house. However, Alex begins to get the distinct feeling that he is being watched, and he starts to think that he is sharing his place with an unwanted housemate. The horrors of the past continue to stalk Alex as the real world and the world of his nightmares begin to collide.

title: Plan B
description: An isolated jazz bar, a disillusioned couple and 2.000.000 euros. A man walks in a bar one day, dies in the restroom of an overdose. The bar owners call the police, but decide to keep the money.

title: 'Bout That Life
description: A brief encounter between two men.

title: The Late Men
description: Three haunted men's lives violently interlock in a remorseless feud for survival and vengeance.

title: Ghost of a Model
description: A top model is determined to win the national championship. However, things take a turn for the worse when she begins to receive death threats.

title: Orajnoitik Noy
description: A lady is going to investigate wax house incidents of Mahabharato(5000 years old incident) in recent days

title: Hidden
description: A reclusive man lets his curiosity get the better of him and faces a rather shocking consequence

title: People Not Humans
description: People Not Humans is a dark drama about a young man, Jack Logan, who has depression removed from his mind through a genetic engineering experiment.

title: Born to Fly, Born to Die
description: The unicorns are coming - and they're angry.

title: Headrush
description: Lighting crashes! Kurt Schuler (Cameron Spann) hovers over a shrouded body. Who is underneath the sheet? Who has been killed and who is the killer? In HEADRUSH, a thrilling science-fiction murder mystery directed by Johnson Thomasson, Kurt is a biochemist who does cutting edge research into the nature of death but when he discovers a mysterious human body in his laboratory, he must race to find the killer or risk losing everything he has worked for... even his own life.

title: Bipolar
description: A young woman's obsession with obtaining a father figure by purposely getting pregnant.

title: African Gothic
description: On an isolated farm in Apartheid South Africa two lovers find themselves at risk of losing everything to a big city lawyer; they will stop at nothing to prevent him from exposing a dark family secret.

title: Carne: Thé Taco Maker
description: Customers from all over come to taste Don Taco's secret tasty meat, unaware of what they are consuming and the dark family secret behind his success.

title: Only the Young Die Good
description: Melbourne, 1949: Private eye Jack Mitchum is a good man in a dirty town. When the beautiful and wealthy Valerie Richmond requests Jack investigate her philandering husband, Jack instead becomes witness to his murder. Identified at the scene, Jack has only days to prove his innocence before he takes the fall. His investigation takes him deep into Melbourne's seedy underbelly. A world of shady bars, wild women and rampant violence. Jack has to play rough and dirty just to stay alive as he learns that in this world, Only The Young Die Good.

title: Followed
description: A Man comes out of jail and found his story of being framed murder had been made as a film called 'Following'. He looks for the person who framed him and plans for revenge...

title: I Came Upon a Midnight Fear
description: "I Came Upon A Midnight Fear" is a holiday ballad first scribbled by Timothy Ryan Becker in 2003. The poem chronicles a miserable and 'cruel' exile, living deep in the wilderness just beyond the borders of the North Pole.

title: Génesis Nirvana
description: Patricia Lucia went out of court with a verdict that proves innocence of the murderer of her only daughter, Genesis Nirvana, a girl of only 6 years old. Inside her head, the only way of having justice is by taking it into her own hands. Her only purpose is revenge. Because of this, she takes a home video camera and leaves a record of it. This is a story of revenge and justice, that show us the weakness and vulnerability of human beings, that lose their sanity after missing a child.

title: Abducted
description: Blue Eyes Gets the Surprise

title: Ekti Rahasya Galpo
description: How can I get this full movie

title: Terezin
description: Terezin is the story of two Jewish sisters who are sent to a WW2 camp. Soon they lose their parents and try to survive against all odds. Eventually they escape with the help of a German man with Jewish sympathies. The German hides the two sisters in his treehouse but a psychotic Nazi begins looking for them.

title: Following the Wicca Man
description: Clayton Stone is a successful film maker, with the world at his feet. When conducting research for his latest film about modern day Witches. He tries to infiltrate a secret Wicca Coven, with disastrous consequences for his loved ones and those who try to save his soul. Has his research gone too far?

title: University Estate
description: It's the last day before Spring break, college student Robby Turnwell is in for the week of his life as he packs his bags and heads home for the weekend. Once he gets an unexpected call from his older brother Jake to house sit, the life he once knew gets turned upside down in this hilarious comedy. From an out of control party to encounters with gangsters, police, and more, Robby reinvents the rule book on college mischief.

title: G.P.S.
description: Jack, wakes to find himself locked in the trunk of a car with a severed leg. Crippled by amnesia and armed with a GPS, he must retrace his steps to discover the grisly truth behind his clouded memory.

title: Nuit de peur
description: Teenagers between 14 and 17 years were selected to participate in the night of fear. In both real and fictional, this night will lead us deep in a forest at night with terrifying secrets.

title: Crossfire
description: A Middle-Eastern CIA case officer must work inside the system, and against a ruthless division chief, to stop the bombing of a village in Afghanistan that is incorrectly believed to be a terrorist stronghold.

title: Through Your Door
description: An unseen Intruder stalks and terrorizes an innocent family, recording every move on a head-mounted camera. A terrifying cat and mouse game ensues as the Intruder removes the father and daughter from the house, leaving the mother to fend for herself.

title: Blood Ink: The Tavalou Tales
description: In the City of Phoenix, a heist gone bad leads to a tattoo artist being brutally murdered. He must take revenge in the after life. A depressed radio promoter seeks redemption after a car accident leads to the death of a young girl Events spiral out of control as worlds collide and souls and tainted with BloodInk.

title: Jours de Cendre
description: Fatima, a woman who wants to change her life. manipulated by Amir she sinks into the violence and banditry.

title: Traduce
description: 'Live with your choices. Die with your mistakes.' Traduce Trevor Bryant is a ladies man who decides to settle down with his longtime girlfriend Emily O'brian. Trevor has one more fling with a crooked cop named Detective Hermon's daughter which turns out to be the biggest mistake of his life. Trevor's decision puts him and his girlfriends life in extreme danger.

title: Castle of Contagion
description: After a deadly virus has forced everyone to stay inside, a young man is left all alone and reflects on the choices he has made throughout his life that defines who he is.

title: Otel mertvetsov
description: Yong man named Sergey went to probation in the Izmailovo-Gamma hotel. He also recording his work on camera. Suddenly, ancient ghosts and spirits have begun the hunter for him.

title: Sleeping Dogs
description: A web of deceit, betrayal, and the ultimate test of devotion.

title: Tales from Los Muertos
description: Three cerebral tales of terror based off Latin American Folklore.

title: This Way to Denmark Hill
description: Jo has a problem that needs to be solved. She phones John, a contract killer, and hires him to help her. Jo's only request is that the murder be done slow. What follows is the near meditative cruelty of torture...murder...death.

title: The Crooked Man Playthrough
description: Combination of the series of Markiplier's "The Crooked Man" playthrough.

title: Midnight Globe
description: In a world where english has long since become the universal language... Nattie is finally old enough to learn how to master the Voyage, a new communication technique used in a popular game of deception known as Wiphala. After beginning her training under the penetrating eye of the mysterious Master Dalle, Nattie soon realises that she is being watched and that a web of lies and deceit surround her. The only way out : jouer au Wiphala!

title: Minotaur
description: After the rape of his sister, Ben pays for the perfect revenge but realizes he can't escape from the consequences.

title: Visiones
description: Esteban is dedicated to seducing women. He falls in love with them and then leaves a brochure with the data of his partner, Marta, who pretends to be a gypsy who divines the future and knows how to make a woman keep the one she loves.

title: Joker
description: A courier who likes to sneak into a customer's home is accidentally involved in a murder case.

title: Love Unlimited
description: This is a story about love for humankind, about loss, corruption and arms trafficking, set against the backdrop of the global financial crisis. A doctor and anesthesiology expert from an NGO, trying to relieve pain all over the world, suddenly enters a personal journey to the limits of suffering. Portraying the eternal fight between good and evil, this drama/thriller celebrates the heroism of people who struggle for a better world and the strength of the human spirit.

title: Lunan
description: A mild-mannered software consultant begins to change after suffering an animal bite. As unbelievable as it may be, he thinks he's figured out what's going on. He has no idea.

title: The Follower
description: A team of South Australian filmmakers sought to tell the story of the Ashman family, a missing persons case that was never solved, and the answer found them.

title: Canvas the Night
description: Two LAPD homicide detectives face the case of their careers chasing a legendary, allegedly cursed painting responsible for a century of mysterious deaths.

title: Alone in This House
description: Alone In This House is about a boy (Jake) who is asked to dog/house sit for a person he's never met before. The owner is already gone by the time Jake gets there but has left a key for him to get in. As if that wasn't strange enough things start getting a little freaky when noises and a shadow figure start appearing. Unable to escape the house due to being locked in and dogs vanished Jake wonders if it was all real or if something paranormal is going on and can he escape...

title: Swollen Feet
description: As Jake dies from a gunshot wound to the heart, he reflects on the events that led to his demise. In doing so, he questions the extent to which he controlled his destiny. Through a series of memories that revolve primarily around a lost love, Jackie, Jake attempts to understand the path he took.

title: Mark of the Veil
description: Young James Sheridan's uneventful life gets blown apart when a vicious killer named Webb abducts James' crippled mother. On the run, James pursues a corrupt politician tied to Webb, and discovers a shadow agency known as THE VEIL.

title: Intruder
description: A killer is on the loose as a woman returns home to discover the terrible truth...

title: The Neuropath
description: William Holmes is a paranoid schizophrenic whose mental disorders work together in unison to add a sense of realism to the visions he has within the turmoils of his daily life. The clustered disorders proceed to create an ultimate disbelief within his friends when he believes that a ghost is terrorising his household. Whilst his friends refuse to believe that there is a ghost wreaking havoc as William has implored them to believe, he is faced with the difficult task of not only putting a stop to the ghost's antics, but also protecting his friends as the ghost slowly beings to attack them each in turn as the days wear on.

title: Liar
description: 3 women encounter a mysterious man that helps them eliminate their abusive husbands. When he comes to collect what is due to him, the women have second thoughts about what they have done.

title: No Strings Attached
description: A woman reminisces with her lover on a park bench, reliving the emotions of their tumultuous relationship.

title: The Breaking Point
description: After a series of brutal murders, two detectives try to recapture an escaped serial killer. As more people are killed, the police are faced with a seemingly impossible task. When the murders hit close to home, detectives John Wesley and Michael MacManus find themselves in a race against time to capture the killer, Nick Samuels, and save the people they love most.

title: The Great Controversy 3
description: The Great Controversy is about a young woman who buys a book that will change her life. It follows the family as they struggle for survival during the end of the world and their belief in an eternal life.

title: P.S.
description: Every apartment dweller wonders about the person next door. It's even fair to say you make some assumptions about your neighbors. However, outside of the occasional 'hello' in the hallway, that's normally about the extent of your interaction. But what if it didn't stop there? What if your neighbor knew your routine? Spied on your significant other. Thought about you. Wrote about you. Prayed about you. And even drew you. Yet, you've never seen that neighbor. The only thing you know about that person is through the cryptic notes that are left at your door addressed to you. This is the story of Mike and his mysterious neighbor Pamela.

title: Dixon Road
description: In November of 2012, a young couple went for a walk through Eastern Ontario farm country. Five months later they were found dead.

title: Hotspot: Log in at Own Risk
description: Have you ever wished happy birthday to someone who is already dead? Hotspot is a feature film that shows us the dangers of social networks in a near future. It's 2017. A scientist is developing Hotspot, a new type of social network system that allows you to actually become who you project online and live the life you create for yourself. A man trying to recreate his life becomes trapped within this new world where reality and the virtual become entangled in a web of confusion and lies. The question is, who is in control of what, and who is in control of who? And more importantly - how do you get out alive?

title: Misfit
description: A prostitute wakes up to find she has been abducted and struggles to bond with her captors and plot her escape.

title: Let's Play, Ghost
description: Five teenage best friends from town: the daredevil Natasha, the foppish Diana, the dupable Davina, Kathy the poet girl, and the cuckoo sissy boy Rhonda decide to spend their holiday in a secluded villa in Puncak Mountain. Just when they step out from the car, they immediately being greeted unfriendly by the maids of the villa; but one of the maids has a crush on Kathy. He then tells her about a wicked legend. Something evil will come out if they say Let's Play five times. Disbelieving the warning, while playing Truth or Dare game they challenge Rhonda to say it. Feeling disturbingly invited, the ghost appears and begins to ask them to play, one by one, and finally, they become her toys.

title: The Abandoned Project X
description: A young man is trapped in a post-apocalyptic shack with his father. The radiation and atmospheric conditions of the world outside make them prisoners of their own home.

title: Christmas Hear Kids
description: A taxi driver finds out the woman in the back of his cab is out for revenge against the man that abused her as a child: him.

title: Four to Midnight
description: WICKED, WICKED WORLD: For Ben and Judy, a camping vacation turns into a nightmare after an encounter with a pair of doomsday preppers. BACHELORETTE PARTY MASSACRE: It was supposed to be a quiet bachelorette party, but when the monkey business began... the girls started dying. The bride-to-be will have to survive this night to make it to her big day. THE INFERNAL: A Catholic priest is summoned to perform the rite of exorcism to purge a demon from a possessed woman, but the unearthly creature has larger plans... and is not alone. BOOM BOOM DOLLS: A sexy tale of gold, murder, and mayhem.

title: Hidden Agenda
description: Jessica is battling the peer pressure from her friends. How much pressure can one girl take? How far are friends willing to go? Someone isn't going to let them get away with this!

title: Deathly Love
description: A parody of love, life and death follows Ricky through a series of relationships with a group of offbeat chicks and a visitor from his past -- desperate to reveal secrets that will change the lives of everyone involved.

title: Kings Park
description: 3 friends take a trip to an abandoned & supposedly haunted mental asylum. While there, they are hunted & chased by a shadowy figure that terrifies them beyond comprehension. They desperately try to escape the torment of the shadowy figure.

title: Page 36
description: A wealthy and manipulative man invites couples to his home to play a game with a fabulous prize but terrifying consequences.

title: Dark Side
description: A wealthy businessman fakes blindness and catches his wife being unfaithful.

title: House of Another
description: During a weekend getaway, a writer escapes his failing relationship by taking refuge in the world of his latest novel.

title: Murphy's Ridge
description: A soldier with a history of PTSD finds himself caught up in a small town's serial killer investigation.

title: Retrieval
description: When a young man helps test out a new technology that allows you to relive your memories, the system goes awry causing him to be able to alter his life, an opportunity that he takes advantage of while the scientists behind the technology try to save his life.

title: The Fated Assemblage of Dr. Malvagio
description: First, a television preacher is bludgeoned to death by a video camera. Second, a male model is crushed to death by weights in his gym. Lowly photographer Carlo ( Chris Humphreys) stumbles onto the pattern behind these murders in his hometown, which all are seemingly tied to members of a cult led by Dr. Malvagio ( Lucian Tomes Jr.). Their goal? To open up the gates of hell.

title: Bangalore Heights
description: The power and the pull of money, the inevitable spiral it brings on whoever falls in its spell.

title: Katarsis
description: Russian special task force group is ambushed in North Caucasus. Survived soldier Gleb, his commander and their captive find asylum in forsaken house, but it turns out to be a mysterious trap.

title: One in a Million
description: After a party, Rebecca gets kidnapped by a serial killer.

title: The Note
description: Will is living in his childhood home, trapped in his past; his brother Dane returns to help him escape. Together they unlock the dark secrets of their history.

title: Kernel Panic
description: Johnson, a trust fund executive, must find a way out of the empty room where he is imprisoned. Will he avoid a Kernel Panic?

title: Murky Hollow's Most Wanted: The Cracker
SRO: Special Research Office for Extensive Investigation
originalTitle: SRO: Keishichô Kôiki Sôsa Sen'nin Tokubetsu Chôsashistu

title: Funeral Arrangements
description: SEE four terrifying segments: A MOTHER'S WRATH (Mom seeks revenge), A WEREWOLF (Hairy Paws), A STRANGER KNOCKS (Don't Answer), A CLEAN SWEEP (Ruthless executive wipes out family)

title: Sadie Clove
description: Sadie Clove, a young girl, begins experiencing events she cannot explain, actions she has no motive for, and thoughts that are not her own. Are these experiences a result of her past, or is something darker responsible?

title: Rubicon or: Let's Talk About Hell
description: Blogger Robert Gale is invited to an interview by an obscure government institution, where he is 'offered' a suicide mission to assassinate a dangerous politician. He is given one night to think it over, but before the end of the night he knows that he is not given a choice.

title: Bait
description: For Brenna and her friends, high school is the time of their lives... at least until the target of their bullying decides to take matters into his own hands.

title: Radical
description: The murder of a mysterious woman unfolds the brutal story of an Israeli radical group, the tycoon they are hunting for and the crooked cops that are stuck in between.

title: Deliria
description: All is not what it appears to be on the isle and in the woods of Deliria. A realization seven friends come to discover all too well.

title: In Good Conscience
description: Shawn, an edgy self-reliant loner born in a rural gangland, must fight for survival when he discovers a lost briefcase full of money which leads him to being relentlessly pursued by the gang whom he once belonged to. Fleeing from a decaying town he vowed to leave behind, Shawn only gets deeper in a maze of deceit and uncertainty which later forces him to realize that in order to find a way out, he must first find himself.

title: Jabal: Ali di ghiaccio
description: Two inseparable friends with a passion for extreme adventure organize an expedition to Mount Etna to debunk the legend of a rare animal who lives in the snowy peaks of the largest active volcano. Once up there, something mysterious happens that will change forever their fate.

title: The System
description: A federal agent charged with stopping mass shootings struggles with using Internet profiling to stop them before they start.

title: Workshop
description: 20 budding thespians who take part in an acting workshop held by an unseen figure are suddenly imprisoned in an abandoned building. They are given no choice but to engage in an improvisational acting battle in which the losers are shot and killed.

title: Honour
description: Nadja is living a good life with her family. But when she's seen with a boy, a rumor starts spreading. Her family must now take action to restore Nadjas reputation. But more importantly her honour. And even more importantly, the families honour...

title: Day Night
description: Finding himself alone in a room covered in blood, a man must discover the events that will ultimately reveal his past.

title: L'inconnue
description: A terrified man flees something and takes refuge in a green property. He spies and strangers come out of nowhere. He falls for a mysterious artist, but she did not see it. Space-time seems to him incoherent. He wants to join her.

title: State
description: While scouting locations for a shoot in Belgrade, Jelena, a young director makes up a story about Marija, a professor of political theory, whose dying father has revealed to her some medical files that could be of interest to several intelligence services. Marija has affection for Marko, a student - until she realizes that he had gotten close to her in order to learn her father's secrets. Marko explains that her father took part in Medical experiments in Africa, which led to deaths of many people in the Congo. Marija has no way of checking whether these allegations are true, because her father dies. She is faced with a dilemma: should she give her father's files to Marko or sell them to foreign intelligence services.

title: Fear for Me: A Novel of the Bayou Butcher
El Quetzal de Jade
description: The murder of a rich man leads a private detective to Guatemala, where a seductive femme fatale pulls him into a tangled web of intrigue surrounding the priceless Mayan jade quetzal.

title: Pine Bros. Presents: Cinema Insomnia Haunted House Special
description: "Pine Bros. Presents: Cinema Insomnia Haunted House Special" was a 2013 television special with Mr Lobo and friends investigating a haunted house.

title: Anime di vetro
description: In an ambiguous and nocturnal Rome, a series of parallel stories intertwine, united by a murky bond of blood and religion.

title: Dollhouse
description: A young girl returns from grocery shopping and realizes she has forgotten to get apples. Ducking into an orchard, she is subsequently haunted by an evil lurking on the property.

title: Jour de panique
description: We will follow our characters in their everyday life at Rivière-Bleue High School. However, they did not expect this day to go bad. They will be victims of an attack by a strange masked suspect.

title: Made in Dream
description: Diana, the Rebellious, and Justin, the Mysterious, throw us into a road movie from France to Great Britain. A runaway ? A quest ? Nobody knows...Diana is living openly under the yoke of Justin that she had found back. Night and day, as a novelist, she writes.

title: Zveno
description: The young scientist is trying to avoid military service in the chemical forces. He chooses alternative service and educates in the suburban orphanage, located in an ancient manor house. By coincidence, several people that worked in the office before him, died in a strange way. Soon the young man realizes that he is in this place not by a chance.

title: 5 People
description: 5 People are held hostage wondering if they will ever see the light of day again. All with different personalities. One has a hidden secret. At the end of the day, can a comic, a preacher, a psychic, a lost soul and a scared person figure out which one of them is behind the madness.

title: Caleidoscopio
description: Luna is steeped in a strong pressure. She remembers nothing of what happened. Only remember your dreams. But there is blood in every... Blanca is adopted child, does not accept its reality and invents all that speaks and makes. Both go to the same psychiatrist and known. They both love the same man. Police are investigating a crime. They think it's a woman. The clues lead to a psychiatrist patients. Luna and Blanca become friends. Out of his solitude helps them overcome their problems. Juan, police who watches Luna falls for her. Luna and Blanca embark on a journey: they want to escape his former life. Meanwhile, another man dies. But it is possible that almost nothing is as it seems.

title: The Killing Silence
description: The Killing Silence traces the story of a couple (Luisa & Samir) that live in Europe and are forced to go back to Morocco to be near Luisa's dying mother. Luisa's mother in her last moments reveals that she is not her biological mother. She gives Luisa a key and an address of a house in a village where Luisa will experience some strange occurrences, where she will discover hidden secrets about her family's and her own past.

title: Shang
description: A young bounty hunter finds out the truth about his father, while battling unexplainable supernatural phenomena that could lead to his own demise.

title: Bob Wilkins Meets the Monsters
description: "Bob Wilkins Meets the Monsters" was a 2013 direct to DVD of horror and science fiction movie trailers, hosted by Bob Wilkins from his 1987 show; with guest Bob Shaw.

title: Savannah Shadows
description: A journey through Savannah's haunted past and some of it's most tragic historical events.

title: D.E.P. El club
description: In a lonely building, a group of young people meet to play a rol game in a vampiric ambiance. Marcos joins to the group, he will observe how the game develops. Everything seems fine until who lead the game suffers a psicotic attack that makes him confuse reality and fiction, pointing out conflicts and past problems between players and giving to the game a dark and dangerous shadow.

title: Hunted
description: Two Teens are mercilessly pursed by an imperceptible monster through the small town of Fort Atkinson, Wisconsin. As the chase heightens the friends realize that there may be no escape and their capture is inevitable.

title: Bobbee Bee the Hater the Movie
description: Take a hilarious yet psychological trip in the mind of BOBBEE BEE the HATER, an obnoxious teenager, who confronts and copes with his attitude and battles the internal self-hatred that is out to destroy him. This film is based on the children's book series, 'IN THE MIND OF BOBBEE BEE the HATER'.

title: American Gun Killers
description: Short wave. Short fuse. It's the American new wave.

title: The Harvest
description: A small Mississippi town looks for salvation at the hands of a mysterious business man at the height of the Depression. All is not what it seems when disappearances and insanity spread through the town. All that stands between the small town and impending doom is a young idealistic city councilman and a jaded priest who is seeking redemption and revenge. The Harvest has begun, but can it be stopped before it is too late?

title: Night Terrors
description: A man slips further and further into various nightmares, not knowing what's real and what's a dream.

title: Creature of Habit
description: In the aftermath of his wife's death, a seemingly innocuous old man reflects on his past sins.

title: Cyan and Blue
description: Everything is as it seems and yet there are layers, sub-stories, and secrets lying just below the surface like the hidden colors in a rainbow or the shadows in a dream.

title: Aftermass: Bicycling in a Post-Critical Mass Portland
description: The world looks to Portland, Oregon as an example of how bicycle culture can blossom out of the ruinous freeways of car-oriented civilization. Aftermass is the first feature documentary to explore the events, people, politics, and social changes that led to Portland becoming the first major bicycle city in the United States. Aftermass features many of the leaders and major participants behind the growth of bicycling ridership since 1971. The narrative demonstrates the complex dynamic throughout the 1990s between advocacy organizations, politicians, city planners, and the then new, grassroots Critical Mass ride. The film is full of smiling faces on two wheels, but also explores the controversies, setbacks, and bumps along the way, including riots, political roadblocks, and an illegal police spy.

title: Spare
description: Tired of problems at work and in their personal life, old friends decide to spend the weekend together. They go to the green hills - a place that enclosed by a dense forest. Suddenly their car breaks down in the middle of the road. Alone with each other they start to remember past quarrels unaware that one of them started a bloody game ...

title: Days End
description: A disillusioned young man's self-loathing is interrupted by a cataclysmic event with life altering consequences.

title: Jake's Dead
description: Reunited by the death of their father, Jake and his brother Mike turn to a mysterious green drug that leads them down a spiraling nightmare of love, betrayal and murder.

title: Espionage
description: Somehow, an insidious terror group called Xin Jiang has remained out of the CIA's grasp. The director of the CIA sends two of the agency's best on a mission to find and eliminate the group's leader -- but, not before they learn how he has been able to gain access to the information that has kept him two steps ahead.

title: Haunted House: Demon Poltergeist
description: For those who think that Ghosts and Spirits aren't real, this is a Ghost Investigation that will change their minds forever. The team from Haunted Events UK are called in to a 400 year old, three story, Victorian house on old High Street in Sutton Town, England - allegedly the most haunted area of Britain. Abandoned by the previous occupier due to alarming Poltergeist activity, the team enters the house to find it a wreck, strewn with objects scattered by the entities dwelling within its walls. Quickly, the team's medium is in touch with the Poltergeist who makes its presence known as a chair slides across the floor before their eyes, not once, but several times and on command. Unnerved but determined, the team moves around the house only to be bombarded by flying objects, lifting tables and two members of the team are even pushed to the floor. A never before filmed series of events occur, making this one of the most terrifying ghost hunts you will ever see. Witness flying objects, noises, thermal heat sources and experience strange forces working to warn the team to leave the residence by pushing over an investigator and leaving behind an actual thermal apparition.

title: Critical Nexus
description: A young woman's pursuit of self-discovery and satisfaction turns deadly

title: Eye Part 3
description: The conclusion of the 'Eyeball Man's' journey.

title: Behind the Eyes
description: We are born, we grow, we learn and the world spins madly on. No matter what we might think, no two days are the same. So many experiences, emotions, people, situations. What do we filter out? What do we choose to remember? What do we choose to forget? Do we choose at all? If something calls from deep inside? Is it real or are we just going insane? That inner child, that sometimes screaming voice inside us all. Do we follow it? Do we hide from it? Do we ignore it? Can we do this for ever? Can we ever be truly happy if we do? When it's not about right or wrong when it's just something you have to do.... Can something change the way you look at the world for ever? This is Darla's Story.

title: Ingrid's Cut
description: A man who thought he had it all together wakes up in a bath tub to find he's not all there.

title: Leonardo Syndrome
description: In order to decipher an old manuscript that might be written by Leonardo da Vinci, an Italian scholar and an English girl go out in a thrilling search ridden with double-crossings and murder.

title: No Smoke
description: A film by Sue Shearing based on a true story that tells of the frightening prospect of a woman being arrested and charged with money laundering due to an English law that incorrectly targets the innocent as well as the guilty.

title: L'Absinthe
description: A New York based writer meets an old publisher who offers to send him to Paris for a change of scenery. There, he unwillingly becomes the accessory to a plot to steal artwork from the Musée d'Orsay. Or is this really happening?

title: Redemption
description: Redemption is the story of an aspiring singer/songwriter who meets a deceitful drug dealer and his life of addiction spirals out of control with tragic consequences.

title: Adormecidos
description: Other than being a fervent fan of horror and sci-fi cinema (B movies included), Raúl seems to be a fairly ordinary man in his early thirties. He's got a 9-to-5 job, follows quite a predictable routine both at work and in his personal life, and appears to be satisfied with the way things are. Yet, behind the surface, there's another side to him. He has a history of psychiatric problems and is now medicated - but don't picture a zombie; he's just your average urban man on your average meds. Plus there's something that's driving him insane: he suffers from an acute case of insomnia. Gradually, his sleeping disorder begins to hinder his work performance; he blames the lame condition of his pillows for his insomnia. So instead of going to see a shrink (again), he decides to buy a NASA-designed intelligent pillow. Believe it or not, he actually wakes up feeling unstressed and well rested. In no time, he's sleeping like a baby. That is, until he begins to have strongly disturbing nightmares. Soon enough, he starts losing touch with reality and feeling like he's someone else. From here on, it all goes into a spiral of unavoidable madness. Or is there any reality to some of the things he's experiencing? What if he's not that crazy?

title: O crime da Legua Dereita
description: Vilalba, 1911, a man is killed after having torn the face skin alive. A strange and mysterious traditional healers techniques are the motive to cure a woman who sobs of a disease in Humanes (Madrid). 100 years later, two brutal crimes put the police against the wall in the city of Lugo, two girls with torn skin of his face appear in the same area. The course of the research will lead to a couple of policemen, who gradually discover that nothing is what it seems.

title: Brandonwood
description: A romantic thriller following four years in the lives of a young couple, from the reckless highs of new love to the lows of circumstances they cannot change on the periphery.

title: Unnodu Oru Naal
description: Two best friends Karthik and Madhav develop feelings for their new colleague Priya. Karthik marries Priya without knowing that she was in a relationship with Madhav.

title: Kampehl
description: With low budget, author and director Yupp Regeler made a slow-pace-thriller about a village, a evil count and a kindergarten teacher who fell in love with the mentalist Karo. They both found some secrets about count Kampehl and the village himself.

title: The Bridge
description: Evan Sears of the Traveling Network show 'Haunted America' travels to the great north woods to explore paranormal activity. While there, Evan learns of the haunting of Allison Antonich. A woman who was raped and then committed suicide after killing her children off the Aerial lift bridge in Duluth, MN. As Evan learns more of this tragic event he starts to change and not for the better.

title: The Possession of Billy
description: Billy, a brave filmmaker. Finds a secluded site thought to house an urban spirit. Billy decides to camp at the site....alone. Billy was never seen alive again. This is his footage, the tape was found near his hanging body.

title: Lockdown
description: Lockdown is the second film from Frank Maddock's A/V Club. The film was written, directed and edited by the students of FMHS. Featuring a cast of more then 40, comprised of students and community members. Lockdown was created over a period of 10 months and approximately 1000 man hours. Lockdown also features original music from Edmonton Indie Band Calista, and local Drayton Valley bands, Changing Everything and Sail With Kings.

title: My Apocalypse: Chapter 2 - Easy Way Out
description: Continuing her journey through an apocalyptic landscape, a young girl considers if life is still worth living.

title: A Certain Kind of Monster
description: A young runaway named Beth is rescued from a violent storm by an unusual man named Ben. Soon, she finds herself agreeing to go home with this stranger to wait out the storm. But what begins as a pleasant evening in good company, quickly and unexpectedly becomes a night of unthinkable horror.

title: Secret Everything
description: The story of a young Brooklyn couple caught up in a game that quickly gets beyond their control. Struggling both as artists and as a couple, Sarah and Nick grapple with a set of circumstances that initially seems like an elaborate prank, but evolves into a journey which transforms their relationship in a lasting way.

title: Above Them the Word Beyond
description: The worlds of Franz Kafka and Josef Fritzl collide to produce a disturbing insight into the notions of incubation as heard through the ears of someone under duress. Isolation as the process or fact of isolating or being isolated, including the social lack of contact between persons, groups, or whole societies... (Psychology) The failure of an individual to maintain contact with others or genuine communication where interaction with other species persists... WARNING not recommended for a Claustrophophile.

title: Innocent
description: A former contract killer tells his daughter how a young girl has changed his life in the past. A story about innocence, war and the abyss of the human mind, told by someone who is both...perpetrator and victim.

title: Be Mine
description: An obsessive man pursues an unsuspecting woman.

title: Material
description: A strange being hunts down those who are indifferent than him, for mysterious motives.

title: Night of the Bloody Antler
description: Two strangers who have met online begin to walk Scotland's West Highland Way, but are stalked by a psychopathic deer-headed killer. Who will survive?

title: Devil Blues
description: Benny, a scared and lonely teenager, inadvertently opens a door to another dimension. Through that door walks Robert Johnson, the long dead legendary bluesman, who, legend has it, sold his soul to the devil at the crossroads.

title: Isaiah Rises
description: Sister Laura Ann Foster serves God with all of her soul, as well as all of her loves. But even her faith is tested when a contract killer makes her his next target.

title: RSJ
description: When RSJ kills his best friend John in a fit of rage, little does he realise his life is about to spiral out of control. In between keeping his son happy and winding up investigating officers, he indulges his passions for fishing, tinned peaches and stalking. As the police struggle to find John's killer, will RSJ's quest for revenge set him free or close the net on him? This inventive, funny and startlingly original thriller brings a unique voice to British cinema.

title: Fit-Boy
description: A no-budget film, produduced single-handed, Fit-Boy is a tale of a group of lads in their late 20s who still haven't quite settled down in their lives yet. One of the group, the womanizing, drug-dealing Fit-Boy (so named because of his skills with the ladies), is starting to get out of control.... With all the crew and cast working for free, and consisting of many first-time actors, Fit-Boy belies its production values and is a very enjoyable, dark drama-comedy.

title: Milk Mustache
description: For the five orphaned MacDonald brothers, the empty days of summer grow darker when one of them befriends a mysterious neighbor - a gun-crazy Vietnam vet with a dangerous agenda.

title: Envelopes
description: When you're blackmailing someone, don't ever be the one to break eye contact.

title: Resurrection Amamba Sayon
description: Hundred of years ago, a girl Leima lost her lover Angou Laishram in a fight against some smugglers. She learned witchcraft from an unknown lady who saved her life to take revenge but couldn't find any suspects afterwards. So, she decided to bring Angou back from his second life by going to the future. By going to the year 2012 where Angou's second life is, she found out that Angou is known as Punciba Nepram and was already in love with his college mate Mary Golson. Later, she plan to kill Mary in case to take back Punciba by using black magic.

title: The Dying Eye
description: Robert spends his nights hunting people for execution with his anarchic gang. But when he falls in love with one of his victims, he sees a new life open up. Can he escape from his life as a trained killer in time to save her?

title: M3ntal State
description: This film takes you on a crazy ride in the life of the Shear Family. One member sad, lost, and abused. and one member suffering from turrets. The journey the embark upon on adds to the crazy world in which they live.

title: Echoes
description: Seth Bloomer is a high school student who finds himself compelled to investigate the suicide of Sophie Lieb, a classmate, against the wishes of Abby, Sophie's twin sister. A mysterious package sent to Seth changes everything: inside is a set of strange discs, with a note declaring that Sophie was murdered. This leads him to discovering more about Sophie and the circumstances leading to her death, involving a schizophrenic middle school student, a disgraced psychologist, and the event that brought all of them together. As Seth descends further, he becomes embroiled in a dark mystery that causes even him to start doubting his reality.

title: Envisioned
description: A group of psychics are assigned by law enforcement to take down the cities untouchable criminals. When one of their own turns against them they must take on a threat that shares their same ability.

title: Goodbye!
description: Written by the acclaimed graphic novel artist Thomas Ott. GOODBYE! adapts his quirky dark tale from page to the screen. One man decides to say goodbye to the world, but the end is just the beginning.

title: The Pine Overcoat
description: A mosaic centered around a young millionaire, two delinquent friends, grief-stricken strangers, and a party of criminals as they each face death in different situations.

title: Playing It Raw
description: Greed compromises integrity in this raw depiction of Houston, Texas street life. One man pushes another until they both go over the edge.

title: Enter If You Dare: House on Creepy Lane Part 2
description: Five segments of horror.

title: Blood Justice
description: A fading gangster turns over his once massive empire to his resistant civilian friend.

title: Bytehik kyn
description: You wake up in the village and there's not a soul around. And you have a video camera in your hand - and what if tomorrow may not come? What will you do?

title: A Shade of Dawn
description: Two young women confront a changing dynamic when one gets engaged to be married and the other claims to receive a cryptic message from a mysterious, supernatural stranger.

title: Lesser Miracles
description: How do you know if you are insane? Riley Carpenter, her devoted husband, Morgan, and their beautiful baby daughter, Vivian, live in a small rural town in Northern California. After Riley and Vivian survive a savage car accident, Riley begins to hear a strange voice that no one else seems to hear. Riley dismisses the phenomenon as her imagination at first, but soon the strange Voice makes eerie predictions about the near future that inevitably come true. Despite fears for her own sanity, Riley and the Voice make a vow to protect her family no matter the cost. 'Lesser Miracles' is the debut feature film from writer/director Rory Walsh.

title: Arthur Parker
description: Arthur Parker, a reclusive scientist, has discovered a curious natural phenomenon. He's spend the last few years trying to understand what it is and now he's on the verge of a breakthrough. However he's about to learn that sometimes, ignorance is bliss...

title: Liberation
description: In a dystopian near future, a young Military Police Officer faces a crisis of conscience after his brother - a radical anti-government pastor - get's black-bagged by the regime.

title: A Place to Call My Own
description: This is an intense and complex psychological thriller with some pretty frightening paranormal elements. A contemporary Southern Gothic tale of murder, insanity, and horrific skeletons in the closet.
